short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that warns you if the product you're looking at contains seed oils.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Concerned about seed oils in your food?

Seed Oil Shopper Warning is your personal grocery assistant that flags products containing seed oils while you browse your favorite online stores. It highlights the specific oils in the ingredient list, making it easier than ever to make informed decisions about the food you buy.


Features:

üö® Automatic Seed Oil Detection: The extension scans the product you're viewing and alerts you if it contains any seed oils.
üîç Ingredient List Highlighting: Seed oils are highlighted directly within the ingredient list, so you can easily see exactly what's inside.
üõí Currently Supports Popular Stores: Works with Walmart, Amazon, Target, King Soopers, and Instacart.
‚è≥ More Stores Coming Soon: We're expanding our coverage to other grocery retailers soon.


Supported Oils: The extension flags the following common seed oils:

Soybean oil
Canola oil
Corn oil
Sunflower oil
Safflower oil
Grapeseed oil
Cottonseed oil
Rapeseed oil
Palm Kernel oil


Why Seed Oil Shopper Warning?

Seed oils are increasingly linked to health concerns, and avoiding them can be a priority for many shoppers. With Seed Oil Shopper Warning, you‚Äôll never have to worry about scanning labels manually again. Our extension does the work for you, keeping your health in mind with every click.


How It Works:

Install the extension and visit any supported online grocery store.

As you browse products, Seed Oil Shopper Warning will check for seed oils.

If a product contains seed oils, you‚Äôll see an alert and the specific oils will be highlighted in the ingredients.
